content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
Instructions
content.question: What does the speaker say about his father’s condition?

choices.label: It is not unusual for the father’s age.
It will not require a hospital stay.
It will not improve anytime soon.

content.answer: It will not require a hospital stay.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
